title: For a Chef Beloved by the Art and Fashion Worlds, Flowers Make a Main Course
description: At the artist Danh Vo's farm north of Berlin, the restaurateur Rose Chalalai Singh created a lively lunch centered on the blossoms that grow there.
dc:creator: Gisela Williams

media:content.media:description: The chef Rose Chalalai Singh collects flowers on the farm of the artist Danh Vo outside of Berlin. To the left is a bank of Rose Campion.
